text:
Mereka lagi ada di ruang tv, Jennie nangisnya udah reda tapi masih ada isakan kecil yang terdengar, Jisoo masih memproses apa yang baru aja terjadi, dia bingung juga kesel karna Jennie yang mancing emosi dia, tapi berakhir dengan Jennie sendiri yang nangis kejer
Jennie masih nahan isakannya sebenarnya dia agak malu karna tiba-tiba nangis kenceng depan Jisoo tapi itu terjadi gitu aja seolah emosinya gak bisa dia kontrol
Karna Jisoo lihat Jennie udah berhenti nangis jadi Jisoo mutusin buat buka omongan
"Jangan salah paham, gue bawa lo kemari karna gue risih kalo harus jadi tontonan orang banyak, gue juga gak mungkin anterin lo dalam keadaan kaya gini, gue gak mau om sama tante cemas dan khawatir, jadi gak usah halu kalo gue peduli sama lo, gue cuma peduli sama sahabat gue dulu" tekan Jisoo "bukan orang asing kaya lo" sindirnya halus, Jisoo ngomong udah lebih tenang gak nggas kaya tadi di supermarket tapi lebih nyelekit terbukti dari isakan Jennie yang terdengar lagi
trans:
They are in the TV room, Jennie is done crying but there is still a small sob heard, Jisoo is still processing what just happened, she is confused and also annoyed because Jennie provoked her emotion, but ends up with Jennie crying very hard.
Jennie is still holding her sobs actually she is a bit shy because she suddenly cries very hard in front of Jisoo but it just happens as if her emotions were uncontrollable.
Because Jisoo saw Jennie had stopped crying so Jisoo decided to open a conversation
"Don't misunderstand me, I bring you here because I am uncomfortable if many people are looking, it is also impossible to take you back in this state, I don't want to worry Uncle and Aunty, so don't get hallucinated that I care for you, I only care about my past best friend" emphasized Jisoo "not a stranger like you" subtly quipped, Jisoo spoke more calmly unlike in the supermarket before but more hurtful showed by Jennie's sob that is heard again.
